a:5:{s:1:"d";O:8:"stdClass":46:{s:9:"short_des";N;s:10:"article_id";s:4:"6513";s:12:"article_type";s:4:"news";s:3:"uri";s:51:"rcep-sdgs-and-the-need-for-sustainable-fdi-policies";s:8:"pub_type";s:1:"0";s:5:"title";s:53:"RCEP, SDGs, and the Need for Sustainable FDI Policies";s:11:"posted_date";s:10:"2021-11-08";s:11:"posted_year";s:4:"2021";s:12:"posted_month";s:2:"11";s:7:"content";s:3833:"<p><strong>Jakarta, 8 November 2021</strong>: &lsquo;Building back better&rsquo; in Southeast Asia offers an opportunity to advance the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals.&nbsp; This was the theme of the recent <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/united-nations-escap/">United Nations ESCAP</a>&#039;s Fifth South-East Asia Multi-Stakeholder Forum (online) on 3 November 2021.</p><p><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAFGebMBYVVqpTygmAIldBOfhdbBHzvSOyI">Dr. Intan Murnira Ramli</a>, Policy Fellow, Economic Research Institute for ASEAN and East Asia participated as a panellist during &lsquo;Session 6: RCEP and the 2030 Agenda.&rsquo;&nbsp; The Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) sets the standard for a new level of economic cooperation, integration, and inclusion across the Asia-Pacific region. The agreement recognises that all three pillars of sustainable development (economic, social, and environment) are interdependent, and that economic partnerships can play an important role in sustainable development. Moreover, the signatories to RCEP have adopted the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development.&nbsp;</p><p>The session focused on the implementation of RCEP in support of the 2030 Agenda, particularly the role of FDI and PPPs to better promote sustainable development in the region. Discussion also touched on how RCEP can and has changed the investment landscape within the region, how it can contribute to the COVID-19 recovery efforts in the region through boosting investment prospects, how it can facilitate infrastructure development through PPPs that bring in new sources of finances, and the specific areas within the Agreement that offer room for incorporating more of a sustainable development orientation.</p><p>Dr Ramli discussed the importance of good and sustainable FDI policies in the region to strengthen the&nbsp;reputation&nbsp;of the countries as investment destinations and thus build the trust of investors in order to<strong>&nbsp;</strong>attract capital.<strong>&nbsp;</strong>With those policies in place, countries are able to stay&nbsp;ahead of&nbsp;regulatory&nbsp;requirements, manage the risks flowing from Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) issues, and obtain<strong>&nbsp;</strong>real value&nbsp;and better terms from the investment activities.</p><p>Watch now:</p><p><iframe title="YouTube video player" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hsQPXBex2uI" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe></p><p>The esteemed panel included <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAApKZHcBTg53pLsssRwSTECSM2OXyi1Njn8">Tientip Subhanij</a>, Chief, IIEDS, TIID, UN ESCAP, <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAKwoxEBVP8CV2AOj1JVKvcjLAE87jCiPfM">Manjiao (Cliff) Chi</a>, Professor, Center of International Economic Law and Policy, Law School, University of International Business and Economics, Yusdiman Saman, Acting Assistant Director, Trade Division, Ministry of Finance and Economy, Brunei Darussalam, Eric Roeder, Coordinator, IEDS, TIID, UN ESCAP, <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABN25AYBnfZY-3CR8DgEN2BF8X2d7SdMA-w">Heather L. Taylor-Strauss, PhD</a>, Economic Affairs Officer, IEDS, TIID, UN ESCAP, <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABuJ_MoBaZRoEFhq2d3vWj4ylKpZH9p7aVI">Senera Sar</a>, Director, Legal Affairs Department, Council for the Development of Cambodia, Atty. Marjorie Ramos-Samaniego, Governor, Board of Investments, Philippines, <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAACfUS58BIVUFoJ-R_NE8h9tN8-j60EQ1VEw">Syed Mohd Faizal Syed Mohd Dardin</a>, Director, Investment Policy and Trade Division, Ministry of Trade and Industry, Malaysia&nbsp;, and Darwin Trisna Djajawinata, Director for Operation and Finance (CFO) at PT Sarana, Multi Infrastruktur (Persero).</p>";s:10:"image_name";s:50:"/uploads/news/20211108/2021-nov-unescap-rcep-2.png";s:9:"video_url";s:0:"";s:4:"tags";s:0:"";s:6:"editor";s:0:"";s:6:"author";s:0:"";s:6:"doc_no";s:0:"";s:6:"period";s:0:"";s:14:"article_status";s:1:"0";s:10:"event_time";s:0:"";s:5:"venue";s:0:"";s:5:"major";s:0:"";s:16:"article_keywords";s:0:"";s:9:"organizer";s:0:"";s:12:"image_name_2";s:0:"";s:10:"start_date";s:10:"0000-00-00";s:8:"end_date";s:10:"0000-00-00";s:8:"keywords";s:6281:"RCEP, SDGs, and the Need for Sustainable FDI Policies RCEP, SDGs, and the Need for Sustainable FDI Policies Jakarta, 8 November 2021: &lsquo;Building back better&rsquo; in Southeast Asia offers an opportunity to advance the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals.&nbsp; This was the theme of the recent United Nations ESCAP's Fifth South-East Asia Multi-Stakeholder Forum (online) on 3 November 2021.
Dr. Intan Murnira Ramli, Policy Fellow, Economic Research Institute for ASEAN and East Asia participated as a panellist during &lsquo;Session 6: RCEP and the 2030 Agenda.&rsquo;&nbsp; The Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) sets the standard for a new level of economic cooperation, integration, and inclusion across the Asia-Pacific region. The agreement recognises that all three pillars of sustainable development (economic, social, and environment) are interdependent, and that economic partnerships can play an important role in sustainable development. Moreover, the signatories to RCEP have adopted the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development.&nbsp;
The session focused on the implementation of RCEP in support of the 2030 Agenda, particularly the role of FDI and PPPs to better promote sustainable development in the region. Discussion also touched on how RCEP can and has changed the investment landscape within the region, how it can contribute to the COVID-19 recovery efforts in the region through boosting investment prospects, how it can facilitate infrastructure development through PPPs that bring in new sources of finances, and the specific areas within the Agreement that offer room for incorporating more of a sustainable development orientation.
Dr Ramli discussed the importance of good and sustainable FDI policies in the region to strengthen the&nbsp;reputation&nbsp;of the countries as investment destinations and thus build the trust of investors in order to&nbsp;attract capital.&nbsp;With those policies in place, countries are able to stay&nbsp;ahead of&nbsp;regulatory&nbsp;requirements, manage the risks flowing from Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) issues, and obtain&nbsp;real value&nbsp;and better terms from the investment activities.
Watch now:

The esteemed panel included Tientip Subhanij, Chief, IIEDS, TIID, UN ESCAP, Manjiao (Cliff) Chi, Professor, Center of International Economic Law and Policy, Law School, University of International Business and Economics, Yusdiman Saman, Acting Assistant Director, Trade Division, Ministry of Finance and Economy, Brunei Darussalam, Eric Roeder, Coordinator, IEDS, TIID, UN ESCAP, Heather L. Taylor-Strauss, PhD, Economic Affairs Officer, IEDS, TIID, UN ESCAP, Senera Sar, Director, Legal Affairs Department, Council for the Development of Cambodia, Atty. Marjorie Ramos-Samaniego, Governor, Board of Investments, Philippines, Syed Mohd Faizal Syed Mohd Dardin, Director, Investment Policy and Trade Division, Ministry of Trade and Industry, Malaysia&nbsp;, and Darwin Trisna Djajawinata, Director for Operation and Finance (CFO) at PT Sarana, Multi Infrastruktur (Persero).             2021-11-08 8 November 2021 1202 rebmevoN 8 80-11-1202             .)oresreP( rutkurtsarfnI itluM ,anaraS TP ta )OFC( ecnaniF dna noitarepO rof rotceriD ,ataniwajajD ansirT niwraD dna ,;psbn&aisyalaM ,yrtsudnI dna edarT fo yrtsiniM ,noisiviD edarT dna yciloP tnemtsevnI ,rotceriD ,nidraD dhoM deyS laziaF dhoM deyS ,senippilihP ,stnemtsevnI fo draoB ,ronrevoG ,ogeinamaS-somaR eirojraM .yttA ,aidobmaC fo tnempoleveD eht rof licnuoC ,tnemtrapeD sriaffA lageL ,rotceriD ,raS areneS ,PACSE NU ,DIIT ,SDEI ,reciffO sriaffA cimonocE ,DhP ,ssuartS-rolyaT .L rehtaeH ,PACSE NU ,DIIT ,SDEI ,rotanidrooC ,redeoR cirE ,malassuraD ienurB ,ymonocE dna ecnaniF fo yrtsiniM ,noisiviD edarT ,rotceriD tnatsissA gnitcA ,namaS namidsuY ,scimonocE dna ssenisuB lanoitanretnI fo ytisrevinU ,loohcS waL ,yciloP dna waL cimonocE lanoitanretnI fo retneC ,rosseforP ,ihC )ffilC( oaijnaM ,PACSE NU ,DIIT ,SDEII ,feihC ,jinahbuS pitneiT dedulcni lenap demeetse ehT

.seitivitca tnemtsevni eht morf smret retteb dna;psbn&eulav laer;psbn&niatbo dna ,seussi )GSE( ecnanrevoG dna ,laicoS ,latnemnorivnE morf gniwolf sksir eht eganam ,stnemeriuqer;psbn&yrotaluger;psbn&fo daeha;psbn&yats ot elba era seirtnuoc ,ecalp ni seicilop esoht htiW;psbn&.latipac tcartta;psbn&ot redro ni srotsevni fo tsurt eht dliub suht dna snoitanitsed tnemtsevni sa seirtnuoc eht fo;psbn&noitatuper;psbn&eht nehtgnerts ot noiger eht ni seicilop IDF elbaniatsus dna doog fo ecnatropmi eht dessucsid ilmaR rD
.noitatneiro tnempoleved elbaniatsus a fo erom gnitaroprocni rof moor reffo taht tnemeergA eht nihtiw saera cificeps eht dna ,secnanif fo secruos wen ni gnirb taht sPPP hguorht tnempoleved erutcurtsarfni etatilicaf nac ti woh ,stcepsorp tnemtsevni gnitsoob hguorht noiger eht ni stroffe yrevocer 91-DIVOC eht ot etubirtnoc nac ti woh ,noiger eht nihtiw epacsdnal tnemtsevni eht degnahc sah dna nac PECR woh no dehcuot osla noissucsiD .noiger eht ni tnempoleved elbaniatsus etomorp retteb ot sPPP dna IDF fo elor eht ylralucitrap ,adnegA 0302 eht fo troppus ni PECR fo noitatnemelpmi eht no desucof noisses ehT
;psbn&.tnempoleveD elbaniatsuS rof adnegA 0302 eht detpoda evah PECR ot seirotangis eht ,revoeroM .tnempoleved elbaniatsus ni elor tnatropmi na yalp nac spihsrentrap cimonoce taht dna ,tnednepedretni era )tnemnorivne dna ,laicos ,cimonoce( tnempoleved elbaniatsus fo srallip eerht lla taht sesingocer tnemeerga ehT .noiger cificaP-aisA eht ssorca noisulcni dna ,noitargetni ,noitarepooc cimonoce fo level wen a rof dradnats eht stes )PECR( pihsrentraP cimonocE evisneherpmoC lanoigeR ehT ;psbn&;ouqsr&.adnegA 0302 eht dna PECR :6 noisseS;ouqsl& gnirud tsillenap a sa detapicitrap aisA tsaE dna NAESA rof etutitsnI hcraeseR cimonocE ,wolleF yciloP ,ilmaR arinruM natnI .rD
.1202 rebmevoN 3 no )enilno( muroF redlohekatS-itluM aisA tsaE-htuoS htfiF s'PACSE snoitaN detinU tnecer eht fo emeht eht saw sihT ;psbn&.slaoG tnempoleveD elbaniatsuS eht fo noitatnemelpmi eht ecnavda ot ytinutroppo na sreffo aisA tsaehtuoS ni ;ouqsr&retteb kcab gnidliuB;ouqsl& :1202 rebmevoN 8 ,atrakaJ seiciloP IDF elbaniatsuS rof deeN eht dna ,sGDS ,PECR seiciloP IDF elbaniatsuS rof deeN eht dna ,sGDS ,PECR";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:9:"highlight";s:1:"0";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"100";s:12:"created_date";s:19:"2021-11-08 17:49:38";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2021-11-08 18:10:07";s:11:"modified_by";s:2:"14";s:7:"old_url";N;s:10:"majorEmail";N;s:9:"education";N;s:10:"experience";N;s:12:"publications";N;s:6:"others";N;s:13:"presentations";s:0:"";s:7:"feature";s:7:"updates";s:11:"sub_experts";s:1:"1";s:15:"sub_dep_experts";N;s:13:"meta_keywords";N;s:16:"meta_description";N;s:5:"sc_id";s:1:"0";}s:1:"g";a:0:{}s:1:"e";O:8:"DateTime":3:{s:4:"date";s:26:"2023-01-18 09:16:23.020898";s:13:"timezone_type";i:3;s:8:"timezone";s:13:"Europe/Berlin";}s:1:"m";N;s:1:"c";N;}
